data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
Hey all,

I'm flying from Europe tomorrow (01/17) and my international flight lands at JFK. Then, I was supposed to take the 10:59p.m. flight to Buffalo, operated by Delta. How likely is it that I will actually make it? If not, when is it a reasonable time for a new flight? Thursday or later?

(Reposted from r/Buffalo, to gather as much info as possible)

Thanks for the help.
